string.value: #b#eTitle Challenge - Persevering Challenger#n\nComplete the #k#bDangerous Dungeon!#k quest. Dalair, on behalf of the God of Honor, is looking for explorers who never cease to face challenges. He says anyone who defeats a lot of monsters in the dungeons in Sleepywood will receive the #bPersevering Challenger#k#n title.
#b#eTitle Challenge - Persevering Challenger#n#k\nComplete 3 types of #bDangerous Dungeon!#k quests in Sleepywood.
#b#eTitle Challenge - Persevering Challenger#n#k\n\nYou have acquired the #bPersevering Challenger#k title and the associated medal.

#v1142084:# #e#b#t1142084##k

- #y2111# Complete
- #y2112# Complete
- #y2113# Complete

#nWould you like to test yourself to see whether you have what it takes to be the owner of this medal?

There is nothing harder than having to hunt a ton of monsters. Go to Sleepywood and complete the #bDangerous Dungeon#k quests. Come back and see me upon completing 3 types of #bDangerous Dungeon#k quests.
Completing a difficult mission is twice as rewarding.

On behalf of the God of Honor, I, Dalair, acknowledge you as the recipient of this honorable title, #bPersevering Challenger#k. Please come and see me whenever you wish to challenge yourself to a different title.

#y2111# (#u2111#)
- #y2112# (#u2112#)
- #y2113# (#u2113#)

You don't seem quite ready to acquire the #bPersevering Challenger#k title. Come and see me when you think you're ready.
